paragraphs: Piquant represents food that is exciting and tasty, that sparks curiosity and interest, wherever you experience it

Hi, I’m Portia and my background as an occupational therapist has inspired me to look at food in a different way. As well as using food as a medium to bring people together, it can be used to empower individuals by engaging them in the cooking process and create positive memories.

I offer services such as being a private chef for your next event, or consultation and execution of a menu we create together so you can treat your friends, family and guests. I also provide meal planning and cooking techniques to fit around a busy schedule.
Whatever your need, let me unleash your potential and create piquant food memories with you.

image1.blurb: Chana chaat masala, homemade chutneys in a thepla cup

image3.blurb: Tempered smoked aubergine, coconut and tahini curd, papads

image5.blurb: Charred cauliflower, makhani sauce, fresh paneer, cashew crumble, chaat masala

contact.title: Hire me
paragraphs: Sit back, relax and enjoy a dinner party in the comfort of your own home, private kitchen or workplace, whilst I do the cooking. Pricing from €60 pp min booking requirement: 6 people.
Throw your own dinner party - Let’s work together and curate a menu for your next dinner party.  Learn to cook a 3 course menu that will wow your guests.

Learn recipes that taste delicious for you, your friends and your family. Master new techniques and discover new flavours. Too busy to cook because you have a busy schedule? Learn how to prepare meals in advance. Can work on a 1:1 basis (€75 ph) or groups of up to 4 people.
Hire me to shake up interesting cocktails at your next event or facilitate a cocktail class for you and your friends or your next team building event.
For group, corporate events and any other enquires please contact me for a consultation:
